package.name: engine
package.shortDescription: The engine package contains the core classes essential to any ash game.
package.description: The engine package contains the core classes essential to any ash game. Most notable is ShellApi, which acts as a proxy for the Shell and provides high-level services for all parts of the game.

package.name: engine.creators
package.shortDescription: The creators package contains utility classes which help configure entities in a standard way.
package.description: The creators package contains utility classes which help configure entities in a standard way.

package.name: engine.data
package.shortDescription: The data package contains the core value classes useful to any ash game.
package.description: The data package contains the core value classes useful to any ash game.

package.name: engine.group
package.shortDescription: The group package contains the core classes which define a hierarchy of containers useful to any ash game.
package.description: The group package contains the core classes which define a hierarchy of containers useful to any ash game.

package.name: engine.managers
package.shortDescription: The managers package contains utility classes which provide services to the Shell.
package.description: The managers package contains utility classes which provide services to the Shell.

package.name: engine.nodes
package.shortDescription: The nodes package contains the core ash nodes essential to any ash game.
package.description: The nodes package contains the core ash nodes essential to any ash game.

package.name: engine.systems
package.shortDescription: The systems package contains the core ash systems essential to any ash game.
package.description: The systems package contains the core ash systems essential to any ash game.

package.name: engine.util
package.shortDescription: The util package contains utility classes which provide core development tools.
package.description: The util package contains utility classes which provide core development tools.

package.name: game
package.shortDescription: The game package contains the game classes specific to Poptropica Island development.
package.description: The game package contains the game classes specific to Poptropica Island development.

package.name: game.components
package.shortDescription: The components package contains the core ash components specific to Poptropica Islands.
package.description: The components package contains the core ash components specific to Poptropica Islands.

package.name: game.data
package.shortDescription: The data package contains the core value classes useful to Poptropica Islands.
package.description: The data package contains the core value classes useful to Poptropica Islands.

package.name: game.item
package.shortDescription: The item package contains the classes which define a Poptropica Island's Inventory Items.
package.description: The item package contains the classes which define a Poptropica Island's Inventory Items.

package.name: game.managers
package.shortDescription: The managers package contains utility classes which provide services useful to Poptropica Islands.
package.description: The managers package contains utility classes which provide services useful to Poptropica Islands.

package.name: game.nodes
package.shortDescription: The nodes package contains the core ash nodes essential to any Poptropica Island.
package.description: The nodes package contains the core ash nodes essential to any Poptropica Island.

package.name: game.proxy
package.shortDescription: The proxy package contains classes which manage data transfer for a Poptropica Island.
package.description: The proxy package contains classes which manage data transfer for a Poptropica Island.

package.name: game.systems
package.shortDescription: The systems package contains the core ash systems essential to any Poptropica Island.
package.description: The systems package contains the core ash systems essential to any Poptropica Island.

package.name: game.ui
package.shortDescription: The ui package contains classes which define the user interface of any Poptropica Island.
package.description: The ui package contains classes which define the user interface of any Poptropica Island.

package.name: game.util
package.shortDescription: The util package contains utility classes which provide Poptropica Island development tools.
package.description: The util package contains utility classes which provide Poptropica Island development tools.
